reviewText: As someone who loves Korean Dramas, I started this one with high expectations. And indeed, the story is engaging. The English translation in my copy, however, was the worst I've encountered. Not only was the grammar incorrect and difficult to decipher, but some words don't even exist in the English language. Often after a discussion, I would be clueless about what had been said. I finally realized that the English translation was based off of the Chinese translation--not the original Korean--and like those games of whisper, much was lost in the process.
